title:
Alphabet Inc. Cl A stock underperforms Wednesday when compared to 
competitors despite daily gains
text:
Shares of Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       inched 1.00% higher to $145.54 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       rising 0.82% to 4,995.06 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.40% to 38,677.36. This was the stock's fifth consecutive day of gains. Alphabet Inc. Cl A closed $8.24 below its 52-week high ($153.78), which the company reached on January 29th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Wednesday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       rose 2.11% to $414.05, Amazon.com Inc. 
        AMZN,
        +0.31%
       rose 0.82% to $170.53, and Meta Platforms Inc. 
        META,
        -1.68%
       rose 3.27% to $469.59. Trading volume (24.9 M) remained 4.9 million below its 50-day average volume of 29.8 M.
